turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there. I'd like to get a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a Hawaiian pizza, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 1 hawaiian pizza, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. I'd like to get three Hawaiian pizzas, please. All large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok 3 large hawaiin pizzas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. And can I also make sure they are all thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure i can add that to the order, your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
